definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="37" y="50"><field name="trigger">mod_serverload</field><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">warn</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Arcanum of Wisdom: Serverside startup information / AoW uses Minecraft's attribute function for LVL effects. Even though changing these attributes using /attribute does not destroy the mod, some functions can only be activated after repeated attempts. It is recommended not to use /attribute. Unlike clientside, this message is not displayed ingame!</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
